about.title: About Me
about.description: Full Stack Web Developer with over 3 years of experience specialized in platform optimization and business process automation. Expert in developing scalable web applications and robust APIs using JavaScript, Python, and PHP, with advanced mastery of modern backend and frontend technologies.
about.description2: Solid experience implementing MVC architectures, SOLID design patterns, and agile methodologies like Scrum. Committed to delivering efficient technical solutions that generate significant impact on business productivity and operations.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer & DevOps
jobs.description: Development of scalable backend solutions and server infrastructure administration for critical enterprise systems.
achievements: Development of robust APIs with Node.js and PHP for enterprise systems integration
Administration and optimization of PostgreSQL databases for high performance
Implementation of Docker containers for application deployment and orchestration
Linux server management and secure production environment configuration

jobs.title: Full Stack Web Developer
jobs.description: Development of scalable web applications and RESTful APIs for custom ERP systems, implementing MVC, SOLID, and DRY design patterns using various backend frameworks including Django.
achievements: Implementation of robust backend modules for risk management and business planning with MySQL
Development of responsive Frontend interfaces with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Angular
Integration of external web services through RESTful APIs, improving system interoperability by 40%
Development of custom Dashboards and dynamic reporting systems

jobs.title: Junior Web Developer
jobs.description: Development of innovative web applications using diverse technology stack including backend with Python and frontend with JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3.
achievements: Implementation of RESTful APIs and MySQL query optimization, improving performance by 30%
Development of intuitive graphical interfaces applying UX/UI principles, reducing bounce rate by 30%
Execution of functional and unit tests applying TDD methodologies
Efficient MySQL database management including schema design and backup systems
